ygData.subject: Re: Retreiving Corpse
ygData.msgSnippet: It happned to me about 2 weeks ago i was wondering around the cave with my friend and he got charmed so I ran out.  When you get charmed you 90% of the time go
ygData.messageBody:
It happned to me about 2 weeks ago i was wondering around the cave with my
friend and he got charmed so I ran out. When you get charmed you 90% of the
time go to Mel's room which has 1-2 Mino guards in there and a skel. When
you become uncharmed you live for about 3 seconds. After not long he got
his body back and we were happy. Later on I got charmed and killed inside
his room. I would try and get close and use the corpse command but it would
always be too far away. After about an hour and about 3 charms leading to
dead bodies i tried to get someone to cast inviso on me thinking it would
work. I wondered into the cave near my body and all of the sudden Mel casts
through the wall and charms me again. I was so mad I thought I would never
get my stuff back. I was so close to just giving up, so I said to myself
ill try 1 more time. I walked in and made a hot key for the corpse command
and scrolled it the whole time i was wondering around through the cave. I
knew where his room was and I would go slow near it. I got 3 bodies out but
none of them were the ones with all my items. I ran up really fast and kept
scrolling it, he started to cast so i ran towards the exit. He charmed me
but I was heading out the exit to the grass when it wore off and I wondered
back In and tried again. After about 3 of these charms not ending up in his
room I got my body back and I will tell you, I will never go back there
again. To me its just not worth it. I dont understand why they put a (so
called 53rd lvl NPC) NPC that high in an area of 10th-12th level critters
and that can cast through walls, attack through walls, and see someone in
inviso.

Bard on Xegony
Pendar


----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman <slide@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 8:31 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Retreiving Corpse


> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...>
>
> Assuming the dangerous creature near your corpse can't detect
invisible
> (?) the easiest way to get your corpse back is to find a kindly magic
caster
> type to make you invisible. Have a hot key equipped with the /corpse
> command. Go to your corpse - then walk a bit away - click that button -
and
> drag your corpse to a safe location...
>
> Slyde Half-Elf of Xegony
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Wanting to get back in touch with old friends?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Reunite through a ONElist community.
